title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When creating a new file, we currently use the line delimiter returned from System.getProperties("line.delimiter"). But this is not what a user always wants.
EB: Users should be able to define their preferred default line delimiter for new files in the Eclipse preferences.
SR:
To reproduce the issue and highlight the need for this feature, consider the following scenario:

1. Open Eclipse on a Windows workstation used as an X terminal.
2. Create a new file within Eclipse.
3. Observe that the line delimiter used is based on the system properties, not the user's preference. This behavior is what needs to change.
